faqs.question: What types of products does National Plastic Industries Ltd offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a wide range of household products, including, Various types of Chairs, storage solutions, Tables, Stools, Drawer, and Much household product designed for durability and comfort.

faqs.question: Where is National Plastic Industries Ltd located?
faqs.answer: Our headquarters is located in Mumbai, India. We have manufacturing facilities across the country (Silvassa, Patna, Nellore) to serve our customers efficiently.

faqs.question: Are your products environmentally friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are committed to sustainability. Our products are made from recyclable materials, and we continuously strive to minimize our environmental impact.
